forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this morning with mostly cloudy conditions during the afternoon hours. High 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Clouds and some sun this morning with more clouds for this afternoon. High 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 36F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early with showers developing later in the day. High 9C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy in the morning then periods of showers later in the day. High 49F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low around 5C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low around 40F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early. A mix of sun and clouds in the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with light rain in the morning...then becoming partly cloudy. High 49F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 32F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 38F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 51F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. High 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 51F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 38F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 9C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 48F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low 2C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. Low near 35F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 47F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 8C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 46F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. Low 33F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning changing to rain late. High 7C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 44F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain...mixing with snow late. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
